name: Rancher's Romance
description:
You are a Rancher. You are also a Night Creature, a being that's not quite human. One day, a Weary Newcomer appears, seeking rest and (not) romance. Yet, when your eyes meet, neither can look away...

Rancher's Romance is a solo RPG created for the 1 Page RPG Jam. You play as a Reluctant Rancher who's more focused on maintaining their ranch than trying to find love, but with the arrival of a Weary Newcomer, you may just change your mind. A small wrinkle(?) is the fact that you are a Night Creature, which is something most people don't bring up on the first date.

Encounter Events and try to connect with the Newcomer, or maybe you'll decide the life of a lone cowpoke is what suits you best. Roll the die and find out!

CREDITS

To learn more about me and the other games I'm working on, check me out on Twitter! (@Kobanya_kana)

One-page RPG format inspired by Oliver Darkshire's one-page RPGs (@deathbybadger on Twitter)

Huetopia & the amazing TTRPG Designers
